title: Police hunt for husband suspected of kidnapping his estranged wife and their three young kids
text:
Police in California are searching for a father suspected of kidnapping his estranged wife and their three young children.

Esteban Lopez, 28, is considered a suspect in the disappearance of his wife Lilian, 29, and their children, Jakob, nine, Steven , six, and Stephania, 5, who have not been seen since October 9.

The family's Great Dane is also missing.

Esteban Lopez, 28, (top left) is considered a suspect in the disappearance of his wife Lilian, 29, (top right) and their children, Stephania, 5, Jakob, nine, and Steven, six, and who have not been seen since October 9

Details of the case remain scarce, but police were called to the family home in Sylmar, near Los Angeles, on October 9.

It is unclear who called them but the family was gone by the time they arrived.

Neighbors say Lilian had a restraining order against her husband but that detail remains unconfirmed.

Police at first described Esteban as missing too but he is now being treated as a suspect.

Authorities have issued photographs of the children and their parents in the hope that the public can find them.

Police are searching for two vehicles of interest that are believed to belong to the family.

They are a 2007 dark gray Lexus with California license plate 7JOM377, and a 1996 white Chevy Tahoe with black rims and California license plate 3RSR716.
description: Esteban Lopez, 28, is considered a suspect in the disappearance of his wife Lilian, 29, and their children, Jakob, nine, Steven , six, and Stephania, 5, who vanished on October 9.
